name: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
overview: The Lost World: Jurassic Park for the Sega Game Gear is a video game adaption of the movie The Lost World: Jurassic Park. It is considered to be one of the rarest Game Gear titles in existence and, with the exception of Super Battletank, which eventually saw a long delayed release by Majesco in 2001, the last officially licensed Game Gear title to be released in any region.
